state.code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant U as User
    participant RS as Referral Service
    participant IS as Insurance Service
    participant AS as Auth Service
    participant VS as Visit Service
    participant BS as Billing Service

    U->>RS: Submit Patient Referral
    RS->>IS: Check Insurance Eligibility
    IS-->>RS: Eligibility Status
    
    alt Is Eligible
        RS->>AS: Request Authorization
        AS-->>RS: Auth Status (30-day initial)
        RS->>VS: Create Patient Schedule
        
        loop Every Visit
            VS->>IS: Verify Current Eligibility
            IS-->>VS: Eligibility Status
            VS->>AS: Verify Authorization
            AS-->>VS: Authorization Status
            
            alt Valid Auth & Eligibility
                VS->>BS: Submit Visit for Billing
                BS->>BS: Process Claim
                BS-->>U: Claim Status Update
            else Invalid
                VS-->>U: Alert: Coverage Issue
            end
        end
        
        loop Every 30 Days
            AS->>IS: Reauthorization Check
            IS-->>AS: Coverage Status
            AS->>U: Auth Renewal Alert
        end
    else Not Eligible
        RS-->>U: Alert: Coverage Issue
    end

sequenceDiagram
    participant U as User
    participant RS as Referral Service
    participant IS as Insurance Service
    participant AS as Auth Service
    participant VS as Visit Service
    participant BS as Billing Service

    U->>RS: Submit Patient Referral
    RS->>IS: Check Insurance Eligibility
    IS-->>RS: Eligibility Status
    
    alt Is Eligible
        RS->>AS: Request Authorization
        AS-->>RS: Auth Status (30-day initial)
        RS->>VS: Create Patient Schedule
        
        loop Every Visit
            VS->>IS: Verify Current Eligibility
            IS-->>VS: Eligibility Status
            VS->>AS: Verify Authorization
            AS-->>VS: Authorization Status
            
            alt Valid Auth & Eligibility
                VS->>BS: Submit Visit for Billing
                BS->>BS: Process Claim
                BS-->>U: Claim Status Update
            else Invalid
                VS-->>U: Alert: Coverage Issue
            end
        end
        
        loop Every 30 Days
            AS->>IS: Reauthorization Check
            IS-->>AS: Coverage Status
            AS->>U: Auth Renewal Alert
        end
    else Not Eligible
        RS-->>U: Alert: Coverage Issue
    end

sequenceDiagram
    participant P as Provider/Staff
    participant F as Frontend
    participant A as Auth Service
    participant C as Claims Service
    participant E as EDI Gateway
    participant AI as AI Service
    participant Pay as Payer/Clearinghouse
    participant DB as Database

    P->>F: 1. Login
    F->>A: 2. Authenticate
    A-->>F: 3. Return JWT

    P->>F: 4. Submit Claim
    F->>C: 5. Submit Claim Request
    C->>AI: 6. Validate Claim
    AI-->>C: 7. Return Validation Results

    alt Validation Failed
        C-->>F: 8a. Return Errors
        F-->>P: 9a. Show Validation Errors
    else Validation Passed
        C->>E: 8b. Transform to EDI Format
        E->>Pay: 9b. Submit to Payer
        Pay-->>E: 10b. Acknowledge Receipt
        E-->>C: 11b. Return Status
        C->>DB: 12b. Store Claim
        C-->>F: 13b. Return Success
        F-->>P: 14b. Show Confirmation
    end

    loop Every 24 hours
        C->>Pay: 15. Check Claim Status
        Pay-->>C: 16. Return Updates
        C->>DB: 17. Update Status
        C-->>F: 18. Send Notification
        F-->>P: 19. Show Status Update
    end

    Pay->>E: 20. Send Payment/Denial (835)
    E->>C: 21. Process Remittance
    C->>DB: 22. Update Claim
    C->>AI: 23. Update ML Models
    C-->>F: 24. Send Update
    F-->>P: 25. Show Payment/Denial
